abstract: Writing a book has been a whirlwind that has taken Alex Brown from the Champions Gift Shop at Santa Anita to the National Racing Museum and Hall of Fame in Saratoga.
snippet: Writing a book has been a whirlwind that has taken Alex Brown from the Champions Gift Shop at Santa Anita to the National Racing Museum and Hall of Fame in Saratoga.

headline.main: After Writing a Book, Savoring the Journey
